What Is A HTML?

HyperText Markup Language or HTML is an tool used by website developers to display data and media on webpages. HTML is the building blocks of the internet and define how a webpage should. HTML is the foundation of the internet. HTML helps define a pages structure from the head to the footer and everything in between.

HTML is essential to learn if you plan on building tools and application online.

Houses & Websites

If A website were like a house the HTML would be the concrete foundation and the wood frame.

HTML Code

Here's an example of some HTML COde.

To define an HTML you simply open it up based on the attribute you want to assign it and close it.

The Origin of HTML

HTML started off in the early 90's
